Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 7 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Bargain Hunter: +2 initial gold/Can use Diplomacy to purchase items at a discount
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Glad-Hand: Can use Diplomacy with a -5 penalty to Make an Impression immediately upon meeting and to retry after 1 min
Group Impression: Can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression with 10 targets
Hobnobber: Can Gather Information in half normal time, and critical failures when taking normal time are normal failures
Legendary Negotiation: (3) Can use Diplomacy with a -5 penalty to convince a foe to negotiate; requires a successful Make an Impression followed by a successful Request
Shameless Request: Reduces the DC for an outrageous request by 2 and changes critical failures into normal failures
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make an Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites

Hit Points: 26 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained)

Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +6 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 16 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Polymath: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 6 allocated
Legendary Negotiation Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15 and diplomacy rank (currently 3) >= 4
Shameless Request Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and diplomacy rank (currently 3) >= 3
